item.title: On the characterization of the structure of distributive uninorms
item.description: arXiv:2410.18120v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: This paper focuses on distributive uninorms, which induce structures of commutative ordered semirings. We will show that the second uninorm must be locally internal on $A(e)$, and will present a complete characterization of the structure of such uninorms.
item.dc:creator: Wenwen Zong, Yong Su, Hua-Wen Liu
